name: Paralyzed
description: A paralyzed creature is incapacitated, can't move, and automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saves. Attacks within 5 feet are automatic critical hits.

effects.description: While you have the Paralyzed condition, you experience the following effects.
mechanicalEffects: Your Speed is 0 and can't increase
You automatically fail Strength and Dexterity saving throws
Attack rolls against you have Advantage
Any attack roll that hits you is a Critical Hit if the attacker is within 5 feet of you
